name: Probably Gonna' Die
description:
This is the first game I have ever made in c++. It has a simple concept, where you dodge skulls falling from the sky. More skulls fall down, the longer you play. It took me about a week to make, and may contain slight bugs. This game will always remain 100% free, but if you would like to, you can choose to buy it for whatever amount.

My goals for this project are:

  • Create a basic game using a basic concept
  • Make the user interface easy to understand
  • Make controls easy to use
  • Add a welcoming but challenging difficulty curve
  • Create animations to make the game look prettier

Please leave constructive criticism to help me make this a more fun and challenging game.

Thanks!
